trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_SEQ_00<tab>Varshahn has a message from Sharlayan.

TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_SEQ_01<tab>While enjoying your sojourn in Radz-at-Han, you learn from Varshahn that the Students of Baldesion have requested your presence in Sharlayan. Thus do you set forth for the Baldesion Annex, where Ojika Tsunjika awaits.

TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_SEQ_02<tab>You meet with Krile and G'raha Tia, who inform you that they had sent for you on Erenville's behalf. The gleaner has returned from his expedition abroad rather earlier than expected, and the change in his plans is likely related to a visitor he wishes for you to meet. While awaiting your arrival, Erenville has gone to the Studium, and you decide to seek him out there.

TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_SEQ_03<tab>After a brief search, you manage to find Erenville and the visitor, who introduces herself as Wuk Lamat, claimant to the throne of Tuliyollal in the far-western continent of Tural. The gregarious woman wastes no time revealing her business: she wants you to accompany her to her homeland and help her triumph in the impending ritual of succession, a contest to determine the next ruler. As it is a rather abrupt request to make of someone she has only just met, she proposes going on a hunt together, the better to get acquainted.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ojika Tsunjika at the Baldesion Annex.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_VARSHAHN_000_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. One of my clerks was just here with a message for you.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_VARSHAHN_000_002<tab>The Students of Baldesion request your presence in Sharlayan at your earliest convenience.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_VARSHAHN_000_003<tab>Indebted as I am to our friends, I had hoped that I too might be of service, but it is you alone that they require.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_VARSHAHN_000_004<tab>If you've no pressing business, pray make your way to the Baldesion Annex at once. Ojika awaits your arrival.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_VARSHAHN_000_005<tab>In the meantime, I shall continue showing Azdaja the city. From notable landmarks to the people's lives, there is still much and more for her to see.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_VARSHAHN_000_006<tab>Farewell for now, my friend. I look forward to the day we set forth on another adventure together.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_100<tab>A warm and hearty welcome to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I gather you received our message?
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_101<tab>Please wait here while I fetch Krile and G'raha.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_000_102<tab>Thank you for coming on such short notice.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_100_102<tab>And forgive us for sending for you so soon after your trials in the void.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_110_102<tab>And forgive us for sending for you so soon after your trials in the void, to say nothing of your grueling battle against the Twelve.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_000_103<tab>Now then, we aren't actually the ones who require your presence, but Erenville.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_000_104<tab>He stopped by recently, you see, and asked us to reach out to you on his behalf.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_000_105<tab>I imagine you're as surprised as we are, given that he was supposed to be away on a long expedition.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_GRAHATIA_000_106<tab>Something must have necessitated a change in his plans.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_000_108<tab>All he would tell me is that there is someone whom he wishes <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to meet.
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_000_109<tab>He also mentioned that he would be tending to business at the Studium. Shall we look for him there?
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_GRAHATIA_000_115<tab>Erenville's early return likely has something to do with this visitor. Who could it be, I wonder...
TEXT_AKTKMM101_04751_KRILE_000_200<tab>Now then, where is Erenville?
